type: Tutorial - Wanna Help? Come On In!

definition.text: You're still around, now with the first two tutorials under your belt! You're family already! Welcome to the Community!

paragraphs.text: In this tutorial, you will learn to keep your system up to date, use the built-in command line, switch branches, and a few more tricks that will make your life easier and —at the same time— help you become a valuable member of the community!

The skills you will learn will also allow you to start contributing to the project! Remember, this is a community project and we are all expected to give back, help drive the project forwards, and keep improving the software! Contributing, by the way, earns you Superalgos (SA) tokens!
